tagline: Make bitcoin/ethereum transactions and get real-time data.
description: Connect to the Coinbase Digital Currency API to make bitcoin/ethereum transactions and get real-time data. Test an API call and export the code into your app.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Geta access token.

args.name: redirectUri
args.info: URL in your app where users will be sent after authorization.

args.name: code
args.info: A one-time use code that may be exchanged for a bearer token.

blocks.name: refreshAccessToken
blocks.description: Refresh access token.

args.name: refreshToken
args.info: The refresh token retrieved during the initial request for an access token.

blocks.name: revokeAccessToken
blocks.description: RevokeAccessToken.

blocks.name: getNotifications
blocks.description: Lists notifications where the current user was the subscriber. Scopes: wallet:notifications:read

blocks.name: getSingleNotification
blocks.description: Show a notification for which the current user was a subsciber. Scopes: wallet:notifications:read

blocks.name: getUser
blocks.description: Get any user’s public information with their ID.

blocks.name: getMe
blocks.description: Get current user’s public information. Scope: wallet:user:read,wallet:user:email

blocks.name: getMyAuthInfo
blocks.description: Get current user’s authorization information including granted scopes.

blocks.name: updateMe
blocks.description: Modify current user and their preferences. Scope: wallet:user:update

args.name: nativeCurrency
args.info: Local currency used to display amounts converted from BTC.

blocks.name: getAccounts
blocks.description: Lists current user’s accounts to which the authentication method has access to. Scope: wallet:accounts:read

blocks.name: getSingleAccount
blocks.description: Show current user’s account. Scopes: wallet:accounts:read

blocks.name: createAccount
blocks.description: Creates a new account for user. Scopes: wallet:accounts:create

blocks.name: setAccountAsPrimary
blocks.description: Promote an account as primary account. Scopes: wallet:accounts:update

blocks.name: updateAccount
blocks.description: UpdateAccount. Scopes: wallet:accounts:update

blocks.name: deleteAccount
blocks.description: Removes user’s account. Scopes: wallet:accounts:delete

blocks.name: getAddresses
blocks.description: Lists addresses for an account. Scopes: wallet:addresses:read

blocks.name: getSingleAddress
blocks.description: GetSingleAddress. Scopes: wallet:addresses:read

blocks.name: getAddressTransactions
blocks.description: List transactions that have been sent to a specific address. Scopes: wallet:transactions:read

blocks.name: createAddress
blocks.description: Creates a new address for an account. Scopes: wallet:addresses:create

blocks.name: getTransactions
blocks.description: Lists account’s transactions. Scopes: wallet:transactions:read

blocks.name: getSingleTransaction
blocks.description: Show an individual transaction for an account. Scopes: wallet:transactions:read

blocks.name: sendMoney
blocks.description: Send funds to a bitcoin address, ethereum address, or email address. Scopes: wallet:transactions:send

args.name: to
args.info: A bitcoin address, ethereum address, or an email of the recipient.

args.name: description
args.info: Notes to be included in the email that the recipient receives.

args.name: skipNotifications
args.info: Don’t send notification emails for small amounts.

args.name: fee
args.info: Transaction fee in BTC if you would like to pay it.

blocks.name: transferAccountsMoney
blocks.description: Transfer bitcoin or ethereum between two of a user’s accounts. Scopes: wallet:transactions:transfer

args.name: description
args.info: Notes to be included in the transfer.

blocks.name: requestMoney
blocks.description: Requests money from an email address. Scopes: wallet:transactions:request

args.name: description
args.info: Notes to be included in the email that the recipient receives.

blocks.name: completeRequestMoney
blocks.description: Lets the recipient of a money request complete the request by sending money to the user who requested the money. Scopes: wallet:transactions:request

blocks.name: resendMoneyRequest
blocks.description: Lets the user resend a money request. Scopes: wallet:transactions:request

blocks.name: cancelRequestMoney
blocks.description: Lets a user cancel a money request. Scopes: wallet:transactions:request

blocks.name: getBuys
blocks.description: Lists buys for an account. Scopes: wallet:buys:read

blocks.name: getSingleBuy
blocks.description: Show an individual buy. Scopes: wallet:buys:read

blocks.name: placeBuyOrder
blocks.description: Buys a user-defined amount of bitcoin or ethereum. Scopes: wallet:buys:create

args.name: total
args.info: Buy amount with fees (alternative to amount).

args.name: paymentMethod
args.info: The ID of the payment method that should be used for the buy.

args.name: agreeBtcAmountVaries
args.info: Whether or not you would still like to buy if you have to wait for your money to arrive to lock in a price.

args.name: commit
args.info: If set to false, this buy will not be immediately completed.

args.name: quote
args.info: If set to true, response will return an unsave buy for detailed price quote.

blocks.name: commitBuy
blocks.description: Completes a buy that is created in commit: false state. Scopes: wallet:buys:create

blocks.name: getSells
blocks.description: Lists sells for an account. Scopes: wallet:sells:read

blocks.name: getSingleSell
blocks.description: Show an individual sell. Scopes: wallet:sells:read

blocks.name: placeSellOrder
blocks.description: Sells a user-defined amount of bitcoin or ethereum. Scopes: wallet:sells:create

args.name: paymentMethod
args.info: The ID of the payment method that should be used for the sell.

args.name: agreeBtcAmountVaries
args.info: Whether or not you would still like to sell if you have to wait for your money to arrive to lock in a price.

args.name: quote
args.info: f set to true, response will return an unsave sell for detailed price quote.

blocks.name: commitSell
blocks.description: Completes a sell that is created in commit: false state. Scopes: wallet:sells:create

blocks.name: getDeposits
blocks.description: Lists deposits for an account. Scopes: wallet:deposits:read

blocks.name: getSingleDeposit
blocks.description: Show an individual deposit. Scopes: wallet:deposits:read

blocks.name: depositFunds
blocks.description: Deposits user-defined amount of funds to a fiat account. Scopes: wallet:deposits:create

args.name: paymentMethod
args.info: The ID of the payment method that should be used for the deposit.

args.name: commit
args.info: If set to false, this deposit will not be immediately completed.

blocks.name: commitDeposit
blocks.description: Completes a deposit that is created in commit: false state. Scopes: wallet:deposits:create

blocks.name: getWithdrawals
blocks.description: Lists withdrawals for an account. Scopes: wallet:withdrawals:read

blocks.name: getSingleWithdrawal
blocks.description: Show an individual withdrawal. Scopes: wallet:withdrawals:read

blocks.name: withdrawFunds
blocks.description: Withdraws user-defined amount of funds from a fiat account. Scopes: wallet:withdrawals:create

args.name: paymentMethod
args.info: The ID of the payment method that should be used for the withdrawal.

args.name: commit
args.info: If set to false, this withdrawal will not be immediately completed.

blocks.name: commitWithdrawal
blocks.description: Completes a withdrawal that is created in commit: false state. Scopes: wallet:withdrawals:create

blocks.name: getPaymentMethods
blocks.description: Lists current user’s payment methods. Scopes: wallet:payment-methods:read

blocks.name: getSinglePaymentMethod
blocks.description: Show current user’s payment method. Scopes: wallet:payment-methods:read

blocks.name: getSingleMerchant
blocks.description: Get any merchant’s information with their ID.

blocks.name: getOrders
blocks.description: Lists the current user’s (merchant) orders. Scopes: wallet:orders:read

blocks.name: getSingleOrder
blocks.description: Show current merchant order. Scopes: wallet:orders:read

blocks.name: createOrder
blocks.description: Creates a new merchant order. Scopes: wallet:orders:create

args.name: description
args.info: More detailed description of the order.

args.name: metadata
args.info: JSON Object. Developer defined key value pairs.

blocks.name: refundOrder
blocks.description: Refunds an order. Scopes: wallet:orders:refund

args.name: currency
args.info: The currency to issue the refund in.

args.name: refundAddress
args.info: Must be a valid bitcoin address.

blocks.name: getCheckouts
blocks.description: Lists current user’s checkouts. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:read

blocks.name: getSingleCheckout
blocks.description: Show current user’s checkout. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:read

blocks.name: createCheckout
blocks.description: Creates a new merchant order checkout product. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:create

args.name: description
args.info: More detailed description of the checkout order.

args.name: style
args.info: Style of a payment button. One of: buy_now_large, buy_now_small, donation_large, donation_small ,custom_large, custom_small.

args.name: customerDefinedAmount
args.info: Allow customer to define the amount they are paying.

args.name: amountPresets
args.info: Array of Strings, allow customer to select one of the predefined amount values.

args.name: successUrl
args.info: URL to which the customer is redirected after successful payment.

args.name: cancelUrl
args.info: URL to which the customer is redirected after they have canceled a payment.

args.name: autoRedirect
args.info: Auto-redirect users to success or cancel url after payment.

args.name: metadata
args.info: JSON Object. Developer defined key value pairs.

blocks.name: getCheckoutOrders
blocks.description: Lists checkout product’s orders. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:read

blocks.name: createCheckoutOrder
blocks.description: Creates a new order for a checkout. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:create

blocks.name: getCurrencies
blocks.description: List known currencies.

blocks.name: getExchangeRates
blocks.description: Get current exchange rates.

blocks.name: getBuyPrice
blocks.description: Get the total price to buy one bitcoin or ether.

blocks.name: getSellPrice
blocks.description: Get the total price to sell one bitcoin or ether.

blocks.name: getSpotPrice
blocks.description: Get the current market price for bitcoin.

args.name: date
args.info: Specify date for historic spot price in format YYYY-MM-DD (UTC).

blocks.name: getCurrentTime
blocks.description: Get the API server time.

blocks.name: nextPage
blocks.description: Retrieve next page for paginated blocks.

args.name: nextUri
args.info: Next page Uri, from pagination object in response.
